;--Dual-Tile x Dual-Tile + Helper for FTLs--
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x02020000,0x04040202,0x5B229000,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x02000002,0x04020204,0x5B229000,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x00000202,0x02020404,0x5B229000,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x00020200,0x02040402,0x5B229000,3,0
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x02020000,0x04040202,0x5B229000,1,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x02000002,0x04020204,0x5B229000,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x00000202,0x02020404,0x5B229000,3,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x00020200,0x02040402,0x5B229000,2,1

;--Dual-Tile x Dual-Tile T Helpers for FTLs--
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x00020200,0x00040402,0x5B229100,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x02020000,0x04040200,0x5B229100,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x02000002,0x04020004,0x5B229100,2,0

;###RHD###TYPE1=0x01040404,0x02040204,0x5C500180,0,0 ;Road crosswalk approach
